address: ZAC du Bois de l'Épine, 19 avenue de la Forêt de Haye, 54500 Vandœuvre-lès-Nancy, France
notes: Solabia's BioEcolia® is an α-glucan oligosaccharide produced through patented enzymatic biocatalysis from vegetal substrates (sucrose and maltose). Available in powder form. ECOSKIN is a related pre/probiotic complex spray dried on maltodextrin containing α-glucooligosaccharides (GOS). Major French cosmetic ingredient supplier with focus on microbiome protection and radiance promotion. Listed on UL Prospector.
